name: CLOUDFLARE__LIST_ZONES
description: Lists, searches, sorts, and filters your zones. Listing zones across more than 500 accounts is currently not allowed.

path.description: Path parameters for the http request

zone_id.description: The zone ID to get details about

name: CLOUDFLARE__LIST_ZONE_DNS_RECORDS
description: List, search, sort, and filter a zones' DNS records.

path.description: Path parameters for the http request

zone_id.description: The zone ID to get DNS records for

name: CLOUDFLARE__CREATE_ZONE_DNS_RECORD
description: Create a new DNS record in a zone

path.description: Path parameters for the http request

zone_id.description: The zone ID to create the DNS record for

body.description: Request body parameters for DNS record creation.

comment.description: Comments or notes about the DNS record. This field has no effect on DNS responses.

content.description: A valid IPv4/IPv6 address for A/AAAA record or a valid hostname for CNAME record.

name.description: DNS record name (or @ for the zone apex) in Punycode.

proxied.description: Whether the record is receiving the performance and security benefits of Cloudflare.

ttl.description: Time To Live (TTL) of the DNS record in seconds. Setting to 1 means 'automatic'. Value must be between 60 and 86400, with the minimum reduced to 30 for Enterprise zones.

type.description: Record type. A, AAAA, CNAME, MX, TXT, NS, PTR, SRV, SPF, CAA.

name: CLOUDFLARE__DELETE_ZONE_DNS_RECORD
description: Delete a DNS record in a zone by zone_id and dns_record_id.

path.description: Path parameters for the http request

zone_id.description: The zone ID to delete the DNS record from.

dns_record_id.description: The DNS record ID to delete.

name: CLOUDFLARE__GET_ZONE_DNS_RECORD_DETAILS
description: Get details of a DNS record in a zone by zone_id and dns_record_id.

path.description: Path parameters for the http request

zone_id.description: The zone ID to get the DNS record details from.

dns_record_id.description: The DNS record ID to get details for.

name: CLOUDFLARE__UPDATE_ZONE_DNS_RECORD
description: Update an existing DNS record in a zone by zone_id and dns_record_id.

path.description: Path parameters for the http request

zone_id.description: The zone ID to update the DNS record in.

dns_record_id.description: The DNS record ID to update.

body.description: Request body parameters for DNS record update.

comment.description: Comments or notes about the DNS record. This field has no effect on DNS responses.

content.description: A valid IPv4/IPv6 address for A/AAAA record or a valid hostname for CNAME record.

name.description: DNS record name (or @ for the zone apex) in Punycode.

proxied.description: Whether the record is receiving the performance and security benefits of Cloudflare.

ttl.description: Time To Live (TTL) of the DNS record in seconds. Setting to 1 means 'automatic'. Value must be between 60 and 86400, with the minimum reduced to 30 for Enterprise zones.

type.description: Record type. A, AAAA, CNAME, MX, TXT, NS, PTR, SRV, SPF, CAA.
